content: Feb 1 Electric and natural gas utility CenterPoint Energy Inc said on Monday it was considering strategic options for its investment in oil and natural gas pipeline company Enable Midstream Partners LP  including a sale or a spinoff.
name: CenterPoint Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 1-CenterPoint Energy considering review of Enable Midstream investment
